name: dapr
description: Comprehensive DAPR development plugin for Python microservices with multi-cloud support (Azure, AWS, GCP). Covers all 12 DAPR building blocks plus DAPR Agents AI framework. Features: state management (Cosmos DB, DynamoDB, Firestore), pub/sub (Service Bus, SNS/SQS, GCP Pub/Sub), bindings (S3, GCS, Blob Storage), secrets (Key Vault, Secrets Manager), HTTP middleware (OAuth2, OPA, rate limiting). Includes AI agents, testing, CI/CD, observability, and security scanning.
